documents.content:
Near East University (NEU) was established in 1988 and is located in Nicosia, Northern Cyprus.
Contact: Phone: +90 (392) 223 64 64, +90 (392) 680 20 00, Email: info@neu.edu.tr, WhatsApp: +90 548 818 0818
Website: https://neu.edu.tr
Address: Near East Boulevard, 99138 Nicosia / TRNC, Mersin 10 â€“ TURKEY

How to Apply: Students can apply online at https://aday.neu.edu.tr. The application system is available for all prospective students year-round.
Website: https://aday.neu.edu.tr
Steps: Visit online application portal, Fill out application form, Upload required documents, Submit and await confirmation

Accepted International Certificates: NEU accepts: GCSE, IGCSE, International Baccalaureate, ACT, SAT, and various international high school diplomas.
Accepted Certificates: GCSE, IGCSE, IB, ACT, SAT, International High School Diplomas

Accepted Regional Certificates: NEU accepts: Tawjihi (Jordan/Palestine), Baccalaureate (Lebanon/Iraq/Syria), Diploma Debirestan (Iran), Higher Secondary Certificate (Pakistan/India/Bangladesh), WAEC/NECO (Nigeria), GAOKAO (China).
Accepted Certificates: Tawjihi, Baccalaureate, Diploma Debirestan, HSC, WAEC, NECO, GAOKAO

Student Residence Permit: International students must register for residence permit at https://permissions.gov.ct.tr/login. The International Students Office assists with this process.
Website: https://permissions.gov.ct.tr/login
Assistance: International Students Office

Tuition Fees 2025-2026: Full list of programs and tuition fees available at https://aday.neu.edu.tr. Fees vary by program and faculty.
Website: https://aday.neu.edu.tr
Note: Fees range from $3,500 to $10,000 per year depending on program

International Students Office: Handles all matters regarding international students including registration, accounting, graduation and student permits.
Location: Faculty of Communications, 2nd Floor
Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM (closed during holidays)

Grand Library: Near East University Grand Library provides study spaces, resources, and academic materials for students.

Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM - 8:00 PM (24/7 during exam periods)

Student Deanship Office: The Dean of Students Office provides services, programs, and various opportunities to students.
Location: Ataturk Culture and Congress Center

Contact: Email neuogrenci.dekanligi@neu.edu.tr, Phone +90 (392) 223 64 64

Post Office: NEU Post Office branch provides postal and mailing services to students and staff.
Location: Faculty of Administrative and Economics Sciences, Ground Floor

Student Dormitories: NEU has 12 dormitories on campus (Dormitory 1-12) plus a Guest House. All dormitories are located within the campus area.

Available: Single rooms, Shared rooms, WiFi, Study areas, Common facilities
Total: 13

Laundry Shop: Campus laundry facility available for students.
Location: Near dormitory area

Pizza Pizza Restaurant: On-campus restaurant serving pizza and Italian cuisine.
Cuisine: Italian, Pizza

Gusto Restaurant & Cafe: Campus restaurant and cafe offering meals and beverages.
Cuisine: International, Cafe

Patisserie and Bakery Cafe: Campus cafe offering pastries, baked goods, and coffee.
Cuisine: Bakery, Cafe

NCS Kebap House: Campus restaurant specializing in kebabs and Turkish cuisine.
Cuisine: Turkish, Kebabs

Chicken House: Campus eatery serving chicken dishes and fast food.
Cuisine: Fast Food, Chicken

The Kaffo: Campus coffee shop and cafe for students to relax and study.
Cuisine: Coffee, Cafe

Near East Olympic Swimming Pool: Full Olympic-size swimming pool facility available for students and staff for recreation and sports activities.
Facilities: Olympic pool, Recreation, Sports training

Near East Basketball Indoor Stadium: Indoor basketball stadium for sports events, training, and recreational activities.
Facilities: Basketball court, Sports events, Training

Near East Sports Complex: Comprehensive sports complex with various facilities for different sports and physical activities.
Facilities: Multi-sport, Training facilities, Recreational activities

Cyprus Car Museum: On-campus museum showcasing the history of automobiles in Cyprus. Open to students and visitors.
Type: Museum

Cyprus Modern Art Museum: Modern art museum on campus featuring contemporary artworks and exhibitions.
Type: Museum

NEU Event Park: Large outdoor event space used for university events, festivals, and gatherings.
Type: Event Venue

Ataturk Culture and Congress Center: Major venue for cultural events, conferences, ceremonies, and university gatherings. Houses the Student Deanship Office.
Type: Event Venue

Near East Bank - Hospital Branch: Banking services near the hospital for convenient access to financial services.
Location: Near Hospital

Near East Bank - University Branch: Main university banking branch providing full banking services to students and staff.
Location: Main Campus

Ikas Supermarket: On-campus supermarket providing groceries and daily necessities for students.
Type: Supermarket

Near East University Hospital: Full-service hospital facility on campus providing medical care to students and the community.
Type: Hospital
Services: Emergency care, Outpatient services, Specialist consultations, Laboratory

Faculty of Artificial Intelligence and Informatics (FAC-AIF): Leading faculty offering cutting-edge programs in AI, Computer Engineering, Cyber Security, and Data Analytics.
Departments: Artificial Intelligence Engineering, Computer Engineering, Information Systems Engineering, Cyber Security Engineering, Management Information Systems, Computer Information Systems, Data Analytics Engineering, Software Engineering

Location: Innovation Centre (INV)
Website: https://aif.neu.edu.tr/

metadata.title: Faculty of Artificial Intelligence and Informatics

documents.content:
Faculty of Engineering (FAC-ENG): Comprehensive engineering programs with modern laboratories and hands-on learning opportunities.
Departments: Industrial Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Biomedical Engineering, Automotive Engineering, BioEngineering, Mechatronics Engineering, Electrical and Electronic Engineering, Materials Science and Nanotechnology Engineering, Petroleum and Natural Gas Engineering

Location: Innovation Center (INV)
Website: https://muhendislik.neu.edu.tr/

Faculty of Medicine (FAC-MED): Medical education and training programs for aspiring doctors with teaching hospital facilities.


Location: TIP Building
Website: https://medicine.neu.edu.tr/

Faculty of Dentistry (FAC-DENT): Comprehensive dental education with modern clinics and experienced faculty.
Departments: Prosthodontics, Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery, Restorative Dentistry, Endodontics, Orthodontics, Pedodontics, Periodontology, Oral and Maxillofacial Radiology

Location: Dentistry Building
Website: https://dentistry.neu.edu.tr

Faculty of Pharmacy (FAC-EZ): Comprehensive pharmacy education with specializations in pharmaceutical sciences and technology.
Departments: Pharmaceutical Basic Sciences, Pharmaceutical Sciences, Pharmaceutical Technology, Analytical Chemistry, Pharmacology

Location: Pharmacy Building
Website: https://eczacilik.neu.edu.tr

Faculty of Law (FAC-HK): Prepares students for legal careers with emphasis on international law and human rights.
Departments: Law, International Law

Location: Law Faculty Building
Website: https://hukuk.neu.edu.tr

Faculty of Economics and Administrative Sciences (FAC-II): Business, economics, and administrative programs preparing students for the corporate world.
Departments: European Union Relations, Banking and Accounting, Banking and Finance, Economics, Human Resource Management, Business Administration, Marketing, Public Administration, Political Science, International Relations, International Business

Location: Economics Building
Website: https://iktisat.neu.edu.tr/

metadata.title: Faculty of Economics and Administrative Sciences

documents.content:
Faculty of Architecture (FAC-MM): Architecture and Interior Architecture programs with focus on sustainable design.
Departments: Architecture, Interior Architecture

Location: Architecture Building
Website: https://mimarlik.neu.edu.tr/

Faculty of Communication (FAC-IL): Media, journalism, and communication programs with modern studios and equipment.
Departments: Cartoon and Animation, Filmmaking and Broadcasting, Journalism, Visual Communication Design, Public Relations and Publicity, Radio, Television and Cinema

Location: Communication Building
Website: https://iletisim.neu.edu.tr/

AtatÃ¼rk Faculty of Education (FAC-ES): Comprehensive teacher training and education programs.
Departments: Music Education, Social Sciences Teaching, Science Teaching, Pre-school Teaching, English Language Teaching, Classroom Teaching, Mathematics Teaching, Psychological Counselling and Guidance

Location: EÄŸitim SarayÄ±
Website: https://egitim.neu.edu.tr

Faculty of Arts and Sciences (FAC-FE): Liberal arts and sciences programs covering humanities and natural sciences.
Departments: Molecular Biology and Genetics, English Language and Literature, Mathematics, Turkish Language and Literature, Psychology, Translation and Interpretation, Geography, Physics

Location: Art and Sciences Building
Website: https://fenedebiyat.neu.edu.tr/

Faculty of Health Sciences (FAC-SBF): Allied health programs supporting the healthcare system.
Departments: Audiology, Nutrition and Dietetics, Physiotherapy and Rehabilitation

Location: Health Sciences Building
Website: https://saglikbilimleri.neu.edu.tr/

Faculty of Nursing (FAC-NURS): Professional nursing education and training programs.


Location: Health Sciences Building
Website: https://hemsirelik.neu.edu.tr

Faculty of Fine Arts and Design (FAC-GSF): Creative arts and design programs.
Departments: Graphic Design, Plastic Arts, Graphic Design Vocational School

Location: Architecture Building
Website: https://guzelsanatlar.neu.edu.tr/

metadata.title: Faculty of Fine Arts and Design

documents.content:
Faculty of Civil and Environmental Engineering (FAC-ICE): Civil engineering and environmental programs with focus on sustainability.
Departments: Civil Engineering, Environmental Engineering, Traffic and Transportation Engineering, Construction Technology, Construction and Technical Drawing Technologies

Location: Tourism Building
Website: https://insaatvecevre.neu.edu.tr/

metadata.title: Faculty of Civil and Environmental Engineering

documents.content:
Faculty of Sports Sciences (FAC-BE): Sports education, management, and coaching programs.
Departments: Physical Education and Sport Teaching, Sports Management, Coaching Education, Recreation

Location: Sports Sciences Building
Website: https://sporbilimleri.neu.edu.tr/

Faculty of Tourism (FAC-TZ): Tourism and hospitality management programs.

Programs: Tourism and Hotel Management (2 years), Tourism and Hotel Management (Undergraduate), MSc in Tourism Management
Location: Tourism Building
Website: https://turizm.neu.edu.tr/

Faculty of Veterinary Medicine (FAC-VT): Veterinary medicine programs with comprehensive animal care training.
Departments: Basic Veterinary Sciences, Preclinical Sciences, Clinical Sciences, Zootechnics and Animal Nutrition, Food Hygiene and Technology

Location: Veterinary Building
Website: https://veterinary.neu.edu.tr/

Faculty of Theology (FAC-IH): Islamic theology and religious studies programs.


Location: Theology Building
Website: https://ilahiyat.neu.edu.tr/

Faculty of Agriculture (FAC-AGR): Agriculture and food engineering programs.
Departments: Landscape Architecture, Food Engineering

Location: Law Faculty
Website: https://ziraat.neu.edu.tr/

Career Planning Services: The Career Planning Unit provides career counseling, job preparation, and professional development support.

Services: Career counseling, Resume writing, Interview preparation, Job search assistance

Disability Support Services: The Disabled Students Unit provides accommodations and support services for students with disabilities.
Contact: "Dean of Students Office"
Services: Academic accommodations, Accessibility support, Assistive technology, Counseling

Student Petitions System: Students can submit petitions regarding refunds, academic matters, job applications, dormitory matters, and financial matters through the online petition system.
Contact: {"email":"petitions@neu.edu.tr"}

Alumni Services: NEU Alumni Unit maintains connections with graduates and provides networking opportunities and continued support after graduation.

Services: Alumni network, Career support, Events, Mentorship programs

Academic Calendar 2025-2026: Full academic calendar with important dates for registration, exams, and holidays.
Website: https://neu.edu.tr/academic/academic-calendar

University Handbook: Comprehensive guide to NEU policies, procedures, and academic regulations.
Website: https://online.fliphtml5.com/mabep/cfjs/#p=37
